name: LIVDSARSCoV2TestCodes
title: LIVD SARS CoV2 Test Codes
description: Using LOINC and SNOMED-CT to identify and report SARS-CoV-2 test results in electronic reporting systems will facilitate timely and quality data reporting to state and federal public health agencies.  These codes are maintained by the CDC at https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/sars-cov-2-livd-codes.html
purpose: (Clinical Focus: EHR and other health IT to update systems to accommodate US SARS CoV-2 specimen collection, testing and results reporting.),(Data Element Scope: SARS CoV-2 test codes approved by CDC as part of the LIVD system (https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/sars-cov-2-livd-codes.html)),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for US approved SARS CoV-2 in vitro diagnostic tests),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not approved for use in US or for tests not yet approved in US)
